column5: No more money to be made 25 a day without fail with no big days down SPWR fluctuates up and down has 5 down days who needs that ENPH not a single 5 down day on the year bad choice see ya wouldnt want to be ya

ENPH SPWR This is what the CEO of SunPower said at the end of his most recent CC Im sure the market is going to take a wait and see attitude on this but I hope he is right Tom WernerAll right Thank you everybody for joining our call We much appreciate it We look forward to our next call as our business is performing significantly better So thank you again

ENPH SPWR Curioius how many Enphase longs are SPWR longs and vice versa I have both but a much smaller position in SPWR Great products but not convinced that their business model has enough margin to be consistently profitable They are releasing their own battery product later this year and trying to transition to services Promising but very speculative given their difficulty in generating profits and their high CapEx costs Really hope they can turn it around as a strong SPWR is great for ENPH For those that follow SPWR closely what do you think will be the catalyst that can really turn things around

ENPH SPWR Some good news from Florida which has been way behind the times thanks to GOP politicians in bed with utility companies to who done everything they can to block solar in the SunShine state While Floridas solar policies have lagged behind other states the trend has shifted and significant growth is expected according to the Solar Energy Industries Association which says the state ranks 2nd for projected capacity installed over the next five years with nearly 55 gigawatts expected to come onlineIn 2018 the Orlando Utilities Commission launched OUCollective Solar an innovative program that makes it easier and more affordable than ever for OUC residential electric customers to install rooftop solar panels Following a competitive bidding process OUC chose esaSolar to design and install turnkey solar photovoltaic PV systems at a discounted price using OUCs collective buying power ussunpowercomblog20190
